events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the item is not what I expected.
After reviewing the customer message, this case is categorized as a refund request.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah for handling the refund process.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to request a refund?
The order number is 123456789. The product looks different from the pictures and does not meet my expectations.
Thank you for the information. We can process a full refund once you return the item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds good to me. Please send the label as soon as possible so I can return the product.
The return shipping label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the product, the refund will be issued promptly.
Just following up to make sure you received the refund after returning the item. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
The refund process has been completed and the case is now closed. Thank you for reaching out to our support team.
